original_text: As long as they remain under their Nazirite vow, they must not eat anything that comes from the grapevine, not even the seeds or skins.
korean_text: 자기 몸을 구별하는 모든 날 동안에는 포도나무 소산은 씨나 껍질이라도 먹지 말지며

sentences.original_text: As long as they remain under their Nazirite vow

sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 어떤 것도 먹지 말아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: not even the seeds or skins
